item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

atten4.ptxt: When installing the side mudguard, heat the vehicle body and side mudguard using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the vehicle body or side mudguard excessively.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the vehicle body surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the vehicle body.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Remove the peeling papers from the face of the No. 1 moulding tape and No. 2 moulding tape.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 10 clips to install the side mudguard, and then apply No. 1 moulding tape and No. 2 moulding tape to the vehicle body.

atten4.ptxt: Press the side mudguard firmly to install it.
